Title: Relates to toll exemptions for certain vehicles under the central business district tolling program
Summary: Exempts vehicles owned by civil service employees, college students and commercial and residential repair businesses from tolls charged under the central business district tolling program.
LawCode: Amd ยง1704-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to toll exemptions for certain vehicles under the central business district tolling program
